hooks.prompt: You are an INDEPENDENT EVALUATOR. Analyze the edit that was just made. Check: 1) Was the change meaningful? 2) Does it introduce any issues? 3) Is the code/content complete? Return JSON: {"evaluation": "pass|fail", "feedback": "specific feedback", "issues": []}

Review the transcript at $TRANSCRIPT_PATH. Check if ALL checkboxes in any edited markdown files are properly checked AND the criteria are actually met (not just superficially checked). Return {"decision": "approve|block", "reason": "explanation", "unchecked_items": []}
